meta.Summary:: Report on the investigation of the fatal accident to person on board Thomson Celebration Tender 15 at Anchor - St Peter Port, Guernsey, Channel Islands on 26 September 2006. Report no 11/2007. Published 4 June 2007.

title: Investigation Report - Thomson Celebration - Tender 15
raw_html:

Summary:
Report on the investigation of the fatal accident to person on board Thomson Celebration Tender 15 at Anchor - St Peter Port, Guernsey, Channel Islands on 26 September 2006. Report no 11/2007. Published 4 June 2007.
